author: John Kasimba Omolo
title: Africa's Cardano Resource
description: There aren't many resources available for the East and Central African Regions
solution: Maasai.io will be the foremost resource tailored to E. & C. African regional needs through relevant and current content and an ADA market.
experience: John is Kenyan, a language teacher, a stake pool operator as well as a Linux/Kubernetes administrator.
